binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered by reddish-brown leather; textile (red) inlays; lavish metal (gilded silver?) covers. Two pairs of sewing stations.

Incised decorations on the (gilded?) silver covers. On the front cover; incised: The Holy Trinity, legend: ሰርግ (ጐ?) ዘማቸ ተስፋ ዘለለ || ውሥለስ (sic) ፡ ቅዱስ ፡ || ዝወንጀለ ፡ ዘወርቅ ፡ ዘቤተ ፡ ጰረቅሊጦስ ፡ ቀሲስ ፡ ዘምካኤል ፡ ገበረ (?) ፡ የተሰፋ ፡ ወልዱ ፡ ለመምህር ፡ ገብር ፡ ጰዮርግሰ (?) ፡ አኽሰም, “The ornament of zämačä (?) Täsfa Zälläläw. Holy Trinity. This is the Golden Gospel of the House of Ṗäräqliṭos qäsis Zä-Mikaʾel, worker of Täsfa (?), son of mämhǝr Gäbrä Giyorgis (?). Aksum” Flagellation of Christ, legend: ዘከመ፡ ኰርዕወ(sic) ፡ አይሁድ ፡ ለእግዘእነ(sic), “How the Jews smote Our Lord”; Crucifixion, legend: ዘበመ (sic) ፡ በከየት እግዝእ<ትነ>, “How Our Lady wept”; ዘከመ ፡ ሰቀለዎ ፡ አይሁድ ፡ ለእግዝ<እነ>, “How the Jews crucified Our Lord”; ቅዱስ ዮሐንስ (?), “Saint John (?)” On the back cover; incised: The Virgin and Child, legend: ቅዱስ ሚካኤ<ል>, “Saint Mikaʾel”; ምስለ ፍቀር (sic) ወልዳ, “with Her beloved Son”; St. George of Lydda: ቅዱስ ጊዮርጊስ, “Saint George”; ደራጎን “dragon” ʾabunä Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi, legend: አቡነ አረጋዊ, “ʾabunä ʾArägawi”
